text: The sensitivity of the LAMP reaction was assessed in two ways : copy number detection and background in which 10 copies of the target could be detected . Copy number detection was measured by serial dilutions of known amounts of DNA containing the target sequences , either as genomic or plasmid DNA ( Figure 3 ) . Reactions fail in both assays at DNA molecule number of less than 1 which is consistent with the stochastic probability of a target being present [ 7 ] .
